SEARCH
Package com.example.queueup.viewmodels

Class AttendeeViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.example.queueup.viewmodels.AttendeeViewModel
public class AttendeeViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for managing attendee-related data and operations. Interacts with AttendeeController to perform CRUD operations and exposes LiveData to the UI.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    AttendeeViewModel()
    Constructor initializes the AttendeeController instance.

  • Method Details

    • getAllAttendancesLiveData

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Attendee>> getAllAttendancesLiveData()
      Returns LiveData containing all attendance records for the current user.

    • getAttendancesByEventLiveData

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<List<Attendee>> getAttendancesByEventLiveData()
      Returns LiveData containing attendees filtered by event ID.

    • getSelectedAttendeeLiveData

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Attendee> getSelectedAttendeeLiveData()
      Returns LiveData containing details of a selected attendee.

    • getErrorMessageLiveData

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<String> getErrorMessageLiveData()
      Returns LiveData containing error messages.

    • getIsLoadingLiveData

      public androidx.lifecycle.LiveData<Boolean> getIsLoadingLiveData()
      Returns LiveData indicating loading states.

    • fetchAllAttendances

      public void fetchAllAttendances()
      Fetches all attendance records for the current user. Updates allAttendancesLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.

    • fetchAttendancesByEvent

      public void fetchAttendancesByEvent(String eventId)
      Fetches attendance records for a specific event. Updates attendancesByEventLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • fetchAttendeeById

      public void fetchAttendeeById(String attendeeId)
      Fetches details of a specific attendee by their ID. Updates selectedAttendeeLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      attendeeId - The ID of the attendee.

    • joinWaitingList

      public void joinWaitingList(String eventId)
      Joins the waiting list for a specific event. Updates allAttendancesLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to join.

    • joinWaitingList

      public void joinWaitingList(String userId, String eventId, @Nullable android.location.Location location)
      Joins the waiting list for a specific event with optional geolocation. Updates allAttendancesLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      location - The location of the user (optional).

    • leaveWaitingList

      public void leaveWaitingList(String eventId)
      Leaves the waiting list for a specific event. Updates allAttendancesLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to leave.

    • leaveWaitingList

      public void leaveWaitingList(String eventId, String userId)
      Leaves the waiting list for a specific user and event. Useful for admin operations or when handling replacements. Updates attendancesByEventLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.
      userId - The ID of the user.

    • updateAttendance

      public void updateAttendance(Attendee attendee)
      Updates an existing attendance record. Updates selectedAttendeeLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      attendee - The attendee object with updated information.

    • deleteAttendance

      public void deleteAttendance(String attendeeId)
      Deletes an attendance record by its ID. Updates allAttendancesLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      attendeeId - The ID of the attendance record to delete.

    • checkInUser

      public void checkInUser(String eventId, @Nullable android.location.Location location)
      Checks in the current user to a specific event. Updates selectedAttendeeLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to check in.
      location - The location during check-in (optional).

    • handleReplacement

      public void handleReplacement(String eventId)
      Handles the replacement of an attendee if they decline the invitation. Draws a new attendee and notifies them. Updates attendancesByEventLiveData upon success or errorMessageLiveData upon failure.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event.

    • clearErrorMessage

      public void clearErrorMessage()
